abstract: Technology issues/trade studies; candidate programs; key contacts/facilities: milestones; accomplishments; and major objectives of the payload accommodation are outlined. Topics covered include: avionics payload support architecture; satellite serving; P/L deploy systems and advanced manipulators; advanced telemetry systems; and on-board abort planning. This presentation is represented by viewgraphs only.
title: Payload accommodations: Avionics payload support architecture

publications.publicationName: Space Transportation Avionics Technology Symposium. Volume 2: Conference Proceedings
